title: What are the different types of knives used for preparing food? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many. Your heavy clever for dehulling coconuts or dejointing sections of meat. Your sticking knife to go to the heart & bleed a animal, skinning knife, filet knifes, paring knife for fine work, Your wood mall for hammering knifes threw joints & such, your meat saw & bone saw, chef knife, regular long & mid blade knifes, light clever, Also heavy shears, It takes a dozen knifes or better to fix food from scratch of the hove.
